DataElement.preferredName: Subject Characteristics Domain Study Chair Approval CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indicator of whether the study chair approves subject characteristic result.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Subject Characteristics Domain Study Chair Approval
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to subject characteristics._A person who is responsible for providing overall management for the operation of the study, and for reporting to the Data and Safety Monitoring Board. The continual review of the data by an independent individual or DSMB assures the investigator(s) that the trial can continue without jeopardizing patient safety._Acceptance as satisfactory by an authoritative body; established by authority; given authoritative approval.

ValueDomain.preferredName: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
